title: Replace hero wordmark with uploaded CCPG brand logo

requirements.summary: Add the provided CCPG transparent logo as a generated static asset and render it as the primary hero logo instead of the existing convert.cpg wordmark.
acceptanceCriteria: A new logo image file exists under frontend/public/assets/generated with a stable filename.
HeroSection renders the uploaded brand logo instead of "/assets/generated/convert-cpg-wordmark.dim_512x128.png".
The hero logo displays correctly on light and dark backgrounds (transparent background preserved).

file_operations.description: Add the generated transparent brand logo asset per imageRequirements ("Transparent brand logo centered with even padding"). Ensure the PNG preserves transparency for correct rendering on both light and dark backgrounds.

Replace the current hero logo image source "/assets/generated/convert-cpg-wordmark.dim_512x128.png" with "/assets/generated/ccpg-logo-transparent.dim_512x128.png" and update alt text to match the brand (preserving existing single-page layout and avoiding changes to other sections/flows).
